summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'Gujrat Citrus', 'citrus', 'citrus fruits', 'Gujrat' | A citrus fruits and leaves dataset for detection and classification of citrus diseases through machine learning | (1) In agriculture, plant diseases are primarily responsible for the reduction in production which causes economic losses | Published: 28 May 2019 : Version 2 : DOI: 10.17632/3f83gxmv57.2 | Rauf, Hafiz Tayyab; Saleem, Basharat ALi ; Lali, M
